sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT user_fname, user_mobile, user_tpin, scheme_id, balance_amt, created_by AS retailer_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.op_code}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND is_active = 1

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_name, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, balance_amt AS admin_balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT user_fname AS rt_coeator_user_name, user_mobile AS rt_coeator_user_mobile, user_email AS rt_coeator_user_email, user_type AS rt_coeator_user_type, balance_amt AS rt_coeator_balance_amt, scheme_id AS rt_coeator_scheme_id, created_by AS dt_coeator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.retailer_creator_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT t_op_api_rel.api_code1, t_op_api_rel.api_code2, t_op_api_rel.api_code3, t_op_api_rel.api_code4, t_op_api_rel.api_code5, t_op_api_rel.api_code6, t_op_api_rel.api_code7, t_op_api_rel.api_code8, t_op_api_rel.api_code9 AS payone, m_api_fwd.service_id, m_api_fwd.api_id, m_api.api_name, m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password
FROM t_op_api_rel
LEFT JOIN m_api_forward AS m_api_fwd ON (m_api_fwd.operator_id = t_op_api_rel.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_fwd.api_id)
WHERE t_op_api_rel.op_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.op_code}} */ AND m_api.status = 1

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.op_code}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.rt_coeator_scheme_id}} */

SELECT user_fname AS dt_user_name, user_mobile AS dt_user_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, balance_amt AS dt_balance_amt, created_by AS mdt_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRTCreator.dt_coeator_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE scheme_id = :P1 /* {{GetDTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */ AND operator_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.op_code}} */

INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, amount, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, revert_trans, ip_address, process_mode, tr_date, transaction_by, opening_balance, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, dtcommper, dtcommval, dtcommamt, dtchargeper, dtchargeval, dtchargeamt, mdtcommper, mdtcommval, mdtcommamt, mdtchargeper, mdtchargeval, mdtchargeamt, is_processed) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_GET.op_code}} */, :P2 /* {{GetOpAPICodeFwrd.service_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetOpAPICodeFwrd.api_id}} */, :P4 /* {{identity}} */, :P5 /* {{$_GET.account}} */, :P6 /* {{$_GET.mobile_number}} */, :P7 /* {{$_GET.recharge_amount}} */, :P8 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P9 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P10 /* {{'Pending'}} */, :P11 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P12 /* {{'Bill Payment of Rs. '+$_GET.recharge_amount+' by  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_fname}} */, '0', :P13 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P14 /* {{'A2C'}} */, :P15 /* {{NOW}} */, :P16 /* {{identity}} */, :P17 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P18 /* {{GetCommision.comm_per}} */, :P19 /* {{GetCommision.comm_val}} */, :P20 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P21 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_val}} */, :P22 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_per}} */, :P23 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P24 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P25 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P26 /* {{DTCommPer}} */, :P27 /* {{DTCommVal}} */, :P28 /* {{DTCommAmt}} */, :P29 /* {{DTChargePer}} */, :P30 /* {{DTChargeVal}} */, :P31 /* {{DTChargeAmt}} */, :P32 /* {{MDTCommPer}} */, :P33 /* {{MDTCommVal}} */, :P34 /* {{MDTCommAmt}} */, :P35 /* {{MDTChargePer}} */, :P36 /* {{MDTChargeVal}} */, :P37 /* {{MDTChargeAmt}} */, :P38 /* {{'N/A'}} */)

values.value: {{'Number: '+$_GET.mobile_number+' | Amount:\n '+$_GET.recharge_amount+' | Bill Payment | Ref. Id:\n '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetCommision.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetCommision.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetCommision.service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetCommision.service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{$_GET.recharge_amount}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P5 /* {{'Bill Payment'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number: '+$_GET.mobile_number+' | Amount:\n '+$_GET.recharge_amount+' | Bill Payment | Ref. Id:\n '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetCommision.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetCommision.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetCommision.service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetCommision.service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P14 /* {{'PENDING'}} */)

'+RTNetAmt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO bbps_info
(pay_ref_id, account, agent_id, bill_no, bill_date, due_date, dueamount, customer_name, api_bill_id, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_GET.account}} */, :P3 /* {{$_GET.agentid}} */, :P4 /* {{$_GET.billnumber}} */, :P5 /* {{$_GET.billdate}} */, :P6 /* {{$_GET.duedate}} */, :P7 /* {{$_GET.recharge_amount}} */, :P8 /* {{$_GET.customername}} */, :P9 /* {{$_GET.apibillid}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */)

options.value: Transaction Pending, Please wait until it become SUCCESS

sql.query:
UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{api_log}} */, is_processed = :P3 /* {{apifiredid}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{remarks}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{api_ref}} */, revert_trans = '0', ip_address = :P6 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, api_response_id = :P7 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, live = :P8 /* {{apiResponseTime > 10 ? 'Push' : 'Live'}} */, extra1 = :P9 /* {{ec}} */, extra3 = :P10 /* {{apibalance}} */, closing_balance = :P11 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P12 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, new_balance = :P2 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P3 /* {{DrBalanceRT.identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{$_GET.recharge_amount}} */, :P4 /* {{AdminChargesAmt}} */, :P5 /* {{AdminClosingBalance}} */, :P6 /* {{'Recharge Charge'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P10 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P11 /* {{'Number:  '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | Amount: '+$_GET.recharge_amount+'  | Charge Credit:  '+AdminNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+RechTrans.identity}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{AdminClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_id}} */
